import { Component, OnInit, Input, HostListener } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-header-one', templateUrl: './header-one.component.html', styleUrls: ['./header-one.component.scss'] }) export class HeaderOneComponent implements OnInit { @Input() class: string; @Input() themeLogo: string = 'assets/images/icon/logo.png'; // Default Logo @Input() topbar: boolean = true; // Default True @Input() sticky: boolean = false; // Default false public stick: boolean = false; constructor() { } ngOnInit(): void { } // @HostListener Decorator @HostListener("window:scroll", []) onWindowScroll() { let number = window.pageYOffset || document.documentElement.scrollTop || document.body.scrollTop || 0; if (number >= 150 && window.innerWidth > 400) { this.stick = true; } else { this.stick = false; } } }
